Sunshine Festival at The Gorge

August 20-21, 2023

Celebrate music and art with us at Lewiston's Amphitheatre this summer! Enjoy a diverse lineup of musical performances, stunning visual art exhibits, and delicious food and drinks in a beautiful outdoor setting.

Get Tickets

About

The Sunshine Festival is an annual event that takes place in the heart of downtown every summer. This family-friendly festival celebrates the best of local music, food, and culture with a lineup of exciting activities and events for all ages.Visitors can enjoy live performances from a variety of talented musicians, indulge in delicious food from local vendors, browse unique handmade crafts, and participate in fun activities and games. The festival also features a lively parade that winds through the streets, showcasing the colorful and vibrant community.
